results: Significant inhomogeneity in the vHS position in overdoped graphene
Two separate reasons for the inhomogeneity: spatial inhomogeneity of the intercalated Yb and substitutional Yb dopants
Yb impurities shift the position of the vHS
Strong local shift of the doping and renormalization of the quasiparticle amplitude due to substitutional Yb dopants
title: Imaging Van Hove Singularity Heterogeneity in Overdoped Graphene.pdf
